bilingual.source: His perspective on life changed after the accident.
bilingual.target: 事故后，他对生活的观点发生了变化。

bilingual.source: His theistic perspective influences his daily decisions.
bilingual.target: 他的有神论的观点影响了他的日常决策。

bilingual.source: His perspective emphasizes the universality of human experience.
bilingual.target: 他的观点强调了人类经验的普遍性。

bilingual.source: The laity often has a different perspective than professionals.
bilingual.target: 俗人通常有别于专业人士的不同观点。

bilingual.source: The idea penetrated his mind and changed his perspective.
bilingual.target: 这个想法渗透了他的思想，改变了他的观点。

bilingual.source: The perspective of the narrater influenced the reader's understanding.
bilingual.target: 叙述者的观点影响了读者的理解。

bilingual.source: His theological perspective influenced his approach to ethics.
bilingual.target: 他的神学的观点影响了他对伦理学的看法。

bilingual.source: Some people view the masculinist perspective as outdated and unfair.
bilingual.target: 有些人认为男权主义者的观点过时且不公平。

bilingual.source: From my perspective, the project needs more time to be completed.
bilingual.target: 从我的观点来看，这个项目需要更多的时间来完成。

bilingual.source: The movie was criticized as tendentious because it ignored the other side's perspective.
bilingual.target: 这部电影被批评为有倾向的，因为它忽略了另一方的观点。

list.abstract: Perspective（英 [pəˈspektɪv]，美 [pərˈspektɪv]），英语单词，作名词为透视画法；视角；视觉外观。例句：It's just about putting things into perspective.（这只是把事情放在一个角度来看。） 近义词standpoint。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, this is my paper. And my perspective is that slavery is bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喂，这是我的论文，我的观点就是，奴隶是坏事。

yingyinNormal.en: But, from an evolutionary perspective, our reaction of disgust to other people's odor is likely our brains' attempt to prevent us from doing harm to our own bodies, specifically interacting with sources of disease.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但从演化的观点来看，我们会对他人的怪味感到反感，是大脑机制要保护我们免遭伤害，尤其是跟病原体接触时，更会感到恶心。

yingyinNormal.en: Kinda puts that whole pillow thing in perspective, Mon?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如此一来，枕头的事就可先放在一旁了，莫妮卡？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, from my perspective, that's how you two appear to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，在我看来你们俩也是鬼祟男。

yingyinNormal.en: From the pure economic perspective, you can think all of these is irrational.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从单纯的经济学角度，你可以认为这些都是荒谬的。

yingyinNormal.en: What if they needed help and didn't have it? Puts everything into perspective for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们需要帮助却得不到呢？这让我看清了一切。

yingyinNormal.en: You think I've lost my perspective? No, I just think eight years is preferable to life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认为我丧失判断能力了吗？我只是觉得八年比终身监禁要好。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, even one infection is too many. At the same time, we have to keep this in perspective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，即便一个人被感染也太多了，与此同时，我们必须客观地看待这个问题。

yingyinNormal.en: From the ancient to the modern, The London Eye offers a complete change of pace and perspective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伦敦眼可让你看到这个城市新和旧的一面，以悠闲的步伐欣赏这个城市。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just very interested in your perspective. Frank worshipped Tim, would have done anything for him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是很想知道你是怎么想的。弗兰克很敬重蒂姆，他愿为他做任何事。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Robertson, it's good to see you again. It's been a while. Yes. From your perspective, I suppose it has.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗伯森先生，很高兴再次见到你。好久不见。是啊，在你看来，确实。

yingyinNormal.en: Sadly, he lost his perspective. He went mad. I haven't, as you well know. I have always seen things very clearly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很不幸，他丧失了远见，他疯了，我没有，你也清楚，我看事情一直非常清楚透彻。

yingyinNormal.en: It turns out that the students who owned the tickets talked about the tickets and thought about them from the perspective of an owner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那些有票的学生在聊到或者想到这种票的时候是从一个拥有者的角度出发的。

yingyinNormal.en: Most people mistakenly treat these situations as being unique, and deal with them without having proper perspective or principles to help them get through them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大数人错以为这些情况很独特所以在处理时没有正确的眼光和法则进行指导和帮助。

yingyinNormal.en: While that perspective might sound very philosophical, I found that it was very practical, because it showed me how I could deal with my own realities in a better way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种看法听起来可能很哲学，但我觉得非常实用，因为我看到了处理现实的更好的方法。

yingyinNormal.en: If you look at things from your perspective, you're always going to think that these people are weirdoes, what's wrong with them, why are they listening to these stuff?
yingyinNormal.zh: 从你的角度，看起来事情都会显得有点奇怪，你总是会觉得这些人是怪人，他们到底怎么了？ 他们为什么听这些东西？

yingyinNormal.en: Turned out, it was the best round of my life because after 13 hours of surgery and a triple bypass, I found something 40 years in the army never taught me: perspective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 结果那成了我人生最大的幸事，因为经历了13小时的手术和三重搭桥术之后，我发现了四十年军队生涯没教过我的东西：远见。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, then here's the most important fact. There's only two people who know what happened in the cockpit that day and I'm one of them. And we appreciate your perspective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那好吧，我告诉你个最重要的事实，当天只有两个人知道驾驶舱内发生的情况，而我就是其中之一。我们感谢你分享自己的见解。

yingyinNormal.en: So from that perspective, it's about a feel of lost, giving up options, losing options, it's about the fact that we do think that more options or flexibilities are better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由此可见这种痛苦是有放弃和失去一种选择造成的，人们总是认为有更多选择和灵活性会更好。

yingyinNormal.en: In the past, if you asked me what's a perfect plan, I'd be like, "I get what I want, I get my dream, I play well." Now I have a different perspective On what a perfect plan is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你之前问我，什么是完美的计划，我可能会答，“心想事成” “打好球，实现梦想” 现在我有新的看法关于什么才是完美的计划

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a particular attitude toward or way of regarding something
sense_info_list.zh: 观点; 看法; 视角

examination_example.sentence: It's just about putting things into <highlight>perspective</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只是要从长远的角度来看问题。

examination_example.sentence: "It's already a huge problem from a public expenditure <highlight>perspective</highlight> for the whole country," he says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “从整个国家的公共支出角度来看，这已经是一个巨大的问题，”他说。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, there is <highlight>perspective</highlight>, which involves acknowledging that in the grand scheme of life, one lecture really doesn't matter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，还有观点，这涉及到承认在生命的宏伟蓝图中，一次讲座真的不重要。

word_usage.usage: 表示“对某事的态度、观点、思考方法”用介词on, …perspective on sth.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从高处看到的展现在面前的宽广的景色。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 态度; 观点; 角度

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a particular attitude toward or way of regarding something
sense_info_list.zh: 态度; 观点; 角度

examination_example.sentence: Lying requires sophisticated planning, attention and the ability to see a situation from someone ease's <highlight>perspective</highlight> to manipulate them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说谎需要复杂的计划、注意力和从别人的角度看问题的能力来操纵他们。

examination_example.sentence: We need to keep the long-term <highlight>perspective</highlight> in mind; that even if computers will outsmart us, we can still be the most creative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要着眼长远；即使电脑比我们聪明，我们仍然是最有创造力的。

examination_example.sentence: Pamela Harris, a lecturer at the University of Texas at Austin, has a similar <highlight>perspective</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的讲师帕梅拉·哈里斯(Pamela Harris)也有类似的观点。

examination_example.sentence: Getting input from others not only offers a fresh <highlight>perspective</highlight> and thought process, it often also includes riskier choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从别人那里获得投入不仅提供了一个新的视角和思考过程，它往往还包括更多的风险选择。

sense_info_list.en: a particular attitude toward or way of regarding something

examination_example.sentence: Research has also found that white students benefit by being challenged and exposed to new <highlight>perspectives</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究还发现，白人学生通过接受挑战和接触新观点而受益。

examination_example.sentence: There is an obvious lack of teachers with a multicultural <highlight>perspective</highlight> to meet the curriculum challenges in America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国，面对构建课程体系挑战，具有多元文化视角的教师明显不足。

examination_example.sentence: We also hope to learn how teachers, parents or school counselors can help students keep their ongoing academic or social difficulties in <highlight>perspective</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还希望能够了解教师、家长或学校辅导员如何帮助学生正确看待他们正在经历的学业或社会困难。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a particular attitude toward or way of regarding something
sense_info_list.zh: 态度; 观点; 角度

examination_example.sentence: They are people of ability, talent, and enthusiasm who can bring their broad <highlight>perspective</highlight> (视角) into specific fields of expertise (专长).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们是有能力、有才能、有热情的人，能够将他们的广阔视野带入特定的专业领域。

examination_example.sentence: It is our hope that advances in science will offer new <highlight>perspectives</highlight> (视角) from which to study how people manage their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望，科学的进步将为研究人们如何管理自己的生活提供新的视角。

examination_example.sentence: These expansions into new worlds help us by giving us new <highlight>perspectives</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些向新世界的扩张帮我们提供了新的视角。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 透视法; 景观; 远景

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 透视法; 景观; 远景

examination_example.sentence: He or she may change the colours, the <highlight>perspective</highlight>, or the composition of pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他或她可能会改变图片的颜色、透视或构图。

examination_example.sentence: A new company (公司), Space <highlight>Perspective</highlight>, is planning tests with passengers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家名为Space Perspective的新公司正在计划对乘客进行测试。

examination_example.sentence: According to Space <highlight>Perspective</highlight>'s plan, space tourists can watch the Earth from space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据Space Perspective的计划，太空游客可以从太空中观看地球。
